attributes.action: Ban flouride in our drinking water
attributes.additional_details: The government has created a new law to make it compulsary to have flouride added to all drinking water. This is set to go through at the end of February 2013. At present it is the decision of each individual water company but it will become the decision of each water authority who are governed by the government. We cannot allow this to happen, studies are showing too many dangers and already 50 states in the USA have banned its use.

rejection.details: Please see: Fluoride in the water supply
